title.rendered: An Elegant Evening in Benefit of ALS Research in Boston

content.rendered: We were honored for the invitation to attend the annual White Coat Affair in support of the ALS community and continued ALS research. The formal event is organized by the ALS Therapy Development Institute each year in the Greater Boston area. One of our Massachusetts division account managers, Patrick Kenslea was able to attend the event and he had a blast! We hope that more of us will be able to join in next year in support of this great cause.
